about_the_game:
Strato Supremacy is a flight combat simulation game where the main goal is to eliminate enemies or destroy cities.

Players must fight against enemies using various aircraft and weapons, as well as destroy cities or perform various missions. Each aircraft and weapon in the game has different characteristics, and players must use them appropriately to defeat enemies and complete missions.

The various terrains and environmental elements provided in the game are randomly generated, making the game even more interesting. The game can be enjoyed at all difficulty levels, and players can progress through the game by unlocking new planes or weapons.

In addition, the game's flight controls are intuitive and easy to learn, providing a sense of realism similar to actual flight. This allows players to experience aerial combat with astonishing maneuverability.

Strato Supremacy is a flight combat simulation game where the main goal is to eliminate enemies or destroy cities.

Players must fight against enemies using various aircraft and weapons, as well as destroy cities or perform various missions. Each aircraft and weapon in the game has different characteristics, and players must use them appropriately to defeat enemies and complete missions.

The various terrains and environmental elements provided in the game are randomly generated, making the game even more interesting. The game can be enjoyed at all difficulty levels, and players can progress through the game by unlocking new planes or weapons.

In addition, the game's flight controls are intuitive and easy to learn, providing a sense of realism similar to actual flight. This allows players to experience aerial combat with astonishing maneuverability.
name: Strato Supremacy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-2700K or AMD FX-8370
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, 4 GB or AMD Radeon RX 480, 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: On board
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-2700K or AMD FX-8370
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, 4 GB or AMD Radeon RX 480, 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: On board

short_description: Strato Supremacy is a flight combat simulation game where players defeat enemies and destroy cities with different planes and weapons while navigating through randomly generated terrains.
